summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a confidential matter involving someone named Peter and a person referred to as 'darling' who is being taken to Larry to talk about Volcker. The email emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the information shared.
